Why Choose Adishesha Institute?

Welcome to the Adishesha Institute of Yogic Sciences, where tradition meets excellence. Our world-class yoga teacher training program empowers individuals to master the art of yoga while unlocking exciting career opportunities.

Comprehensive Training

  • 200-hour foundational training
  • 400-hour advanced curriculum
  • Flexible online and offline modes

Expert Faculty

  • Highly qualified instructors
  • Extensive yoga experience
  • Personalized guidance

Flexible Learning

  • Weekend classes
  • Weekday options
  • Online sessions
Learn more about our approach

Life-Changing Journey

"Yoga gave me back my life."

"After years of chronic pain and stress, I found relief through the Adishesha yoga program. Not only did I transform physically, losing 10kg and gaining strength, but I discovered inner peace and purpose. Now I teach others and earn more than I ever did in my corporate job."

Meera Patel

200-Hour Program Graduate
